Question: ShenZhen Ankbit Electronics Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ShenZhen Ankbit Electronics Limited

Product: Unveiled latest consumer electronic products at CES 2024

- Features advanced imaging solutions
- Showcases laser display technology
- Pioneering innovator in Light Detection and Ranging (LiDAR) technology
